job_description:
Are you an outstanding Java developer who has worked on large data-driven projects? Do you have a passion for cybersecurity and have implemented an ETL framework for centralized access management? Do you want to help transform a company's systems from legacy to a DevOps environment? If so, then you might be Fivesky's next Senior Java Developer!

Who you are:

5+ years of Multi-threaded Java/OO design and development with a focus on building new system features and components
A strong database developer when it comes to SQL Database experience in a large enterprise environment with some DB2
Software performance is everything, and you have implemented object caching, to ensure reliability of code through unit-testing
Collaborate with an Agile team and contribute to Agile/DevOps transformation
Like to learn about the business to better support the team's goals
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

What you will do:

Design, enhance and maintain a multi-tier Java application focused on Identity and Access Management
Work on data protection, access management, and fraud prevention in a highly regulated environment
Create Microservices, build REST APIs and work in a cloud infrastructure, like AWS with Azure preferred
Use your strong object-oriented design and relational databases (preferably DB2) and SQL skills
Responsible for unit-testing and debugging using tools like Mockito, JUnit and Cucumber
Be a team player, using your analytical mindset when it comes to problem-solving and passion when coming up with clever solutions
Communicate both verbally and in writing

It would be awesome if you had:

Knowledge of Kafka, Spark, Spring Framework, JavaScript, and UNIX
Familiarity with Agile/DevOps practices and tools like GIT/Jenkins
Understanding of SOA, SOAP, REST, XML, and JSON
Experience with In-Memory databases

Who we are:

Fivesky is a fast-growing, global technology solution provider. We partner with the world's largest financial service firms to deliver networking/infrastructure, cybersecurity, and cloud-based solutions for complex, global projects.

At Fivesky, our employees are our greatest asset and we strive to build a strong team culture centered on highly competitive compensation, professional development, career advancement, and fun.

Fivesky is an equal-opportunity employer. In accordance with anti-discrimination law, it is the purpose of this policy to effectuate these principles and mandates. Fivesky prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type and affords equal employment opportunities to employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status (United States positions), or any other characteristic protected by law.

This is a Full-time position in Montreal, CAD. The compensation package is based on experience and qualifications.
